pull.title: gitignore: plist and dat
pull.body: Ignore anything ending in `.dat` and files generated by clang-check.

events.body:
utACK 17be9e0e3037b60ba7bbf4b9249f2efc5e1ba9b3

some days I wish, that like `cmake`, autoconf would strongly encourage building out-of-tree, so that not so many random build artifacts end up in the git tree—this is always a growing set
Running `git status` while `make` is running shows untracked files `*.o.tmp`. This one could be added too.
